channel.title: CVE Feed for Glarysoft Ltd. -- Installer of Glary Utilities
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Glarysoft Ltd. -- Installer of Glary Utilities

item.title: CVE-2018-0619|2024-08-05T03:28:11.200Z -- glarysoft%20ltd. -- installer%20of%20glary%20utilities
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Glarysoft Glary Utilities (Glary Utilities 5.99 and earlier and Glary Utilities Pro 5.99 and earlier) allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
